message.body: Hi there Wendy! How's it going?
Hi, Rohan! Going great. No work today either:-)
But I work tomorrow, Sat & Sun
Ah, I see. Do you always work on weekends?
Most weekend unless I specifically don't sched work
My boss would love me if I did that. I typically wriggle out of weekend work. :P Say, do you watch Game of Thrones?
No. I pretty much only watch what my boyfriend calls the "dead peoples channel": IDTV
(1/2)Haha. I'm asking because the last episode was so outrageous that it's the talk of the town (read: internet). Never mind. Tell me, does the *w* in your
(2/2)screen name stand for Wendy? What's the *r*?
I think my boyfriend read the king of thrones books
Yeah, they're brilliant. As is the TV show. You read a lot of books?
Not a lot but I do read occasionally, always non fiction
I typically read more fiction. Especially fantasy series like LoTR or Harry Potter or Game of Thrones and the like. Do you prefer any author in particular?
No fave author except I admire Dr Seuss.:-) but I enjoy stories of true life survival and serial murder.
And I've read a number of holocaust books
That sounds interesting. Could you recommend any?
Miracle in the Andes was amazing. And Escape from Camp 14
